issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Contacts display google synched contacts also when fetched through id whereas it doesn't while picking contacts through display people or contacts picker.
This is not regression as this issue occurs as far as 2.1.0.

Steps to reproduce:
Add some contacts to contacts list and sync google account with some contacts.
1. Go to Kitchensink> Phone> Contacts.
2. Click on display people. 
3. Click on search by Id. enter ids.

Actual:
2. Contacts are displayed but google account contacts are not displayed. 
3. It extracts the google contacts and phone contacts both.

Expected:
Same contacts should be retrieved while fetching through 'display people' and ' Search by Id'.
fields.summary: Android: Kitchensink - Contacts display google synced contacts also when fetched through id whereas it doesn't while picking contacts through display people or contacts picker
fields.environment:
SDK: 2.1.3.v20120915120319
Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Devices: Samsung galaxy tab(v 3.2), Samsung galaxy note(v 2.3.6)
OS: OSX 10.8

comments.body:
Not able to reproduce.

Tested on:
Titanium studio : 2.1.2.201208301612
SDK version : 2.1.3.v20120915120319
Samsung Galaxy S3 android 4.0.4
Sony tablet (android 3.2)

Still able to reproduce. Kindly check with the updated description of the bug.

Tested with:
SDK: 2.1.3.v20120918170114
Studio:2.1.2.201208301612
Device: Samsung galaxy note(v 2.3.6)
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
